segments.text: I heard that you finished my home inspection , and I was wondering how it went .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , we need to understand what I was looking for . Do you know what the purpose of an inspection is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure what a home inspection is all about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went there to check for problems with the home , so you aren ’ t surprised when you move in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wouldn ’ t the owners have told me about any problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sellers aren ’ t always truthful , and there might also be problems that they aren ’ t aware of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I require the owners to fix the problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can make the sale of the house contingent on them fixing the problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you find out when you did the inspection of my new home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There were no major problems . One leaky pipe under the sink and two broken roof tiles was all that I found .
segments.speaker: S2
